values: It seems that alot of people have problems with things that have nothing to do with them. Alot of people have alot to stay about stuff they know nothing about. And I've gotten too much hassle for it; I'm sick of it. So guess what the solution is? Friends Only. That's right. If you think you can handle me, listen to me, and maybe understand me instead of judge me... then you can leave me a comment. I'll think about it, and if I agree with you, I'll add you. For anyone else that actually genuinely cared and everything but doesn't have a journal, I'm sorry. To the rest of you.. screw you. Screw it. Whatever, I don't care about you. I beleive in myself.. and that's enough.
